guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

body: I went and talked with my pastor, he said you need to get baptized to go into Heaven. I stopped believing in Heaven shortly after. How could he be telling me about a place he's never been?
body_html: I went and talked with my pastor, he said you need to get baptized to go into Heaven. I stopped believing in Heaven shortly after. How could he be telling me about a place he's never been?

body: Plenty of people didn't need to get water baptized. It's not baptism with water that counts, but rather baptism with the Holy Spirit and fire.
body_html: Plenty of people didn't need to get water baptized. It's not baptism with water that counts, but rather baptism with the Holy Spirit and fire.

post.title: How to be Saved - The ONLY way to Become Born Again:

body:
You were meant to be a pharisee man. Lighten up. 

God is love. These strict rules, like “you must say these exact words” were thrown out. It’s not necessary. 

All you have to do is believe. And the more you believe, the more good works you’ll naturally want to do, to glorify God. 

It amazes me how much we want to complicate Jesus’s straightforward message. 

Just believe. See you in heaven, brother!
body_html:
You were meant to be a pharisee man. Lighten up.

God is love. These strict rules, like “you must say these exact words” were thrown out. It’s not necessary.

All you have to do is believe. And the more you believe, the more good works you’ll naturally want to do, to glorify God.

It amazes me how much we want to complicate Jesus’s straightforward message.

Just believe. See you in heaven, brother!
